name: Anthony Towns
cooked: Okay, that’s three complaints about this and the stackoverflow thing about the similar constraint there doesn’t indicate it’s very useful, so I’ve bumped this from 2 to 100. You’re also bumped from new user to regular; in theory discourse automatically adjusts trust levels as you read/post/comment/etc.
raw: Okay, that's three complaints about this and the [stackoverflow thing](https://meta.stackexchange.com/questions/122893/does-restricting-the-number-of-links-for-new-users-do-any-good) about the similar constraint there doesn't indicate it's very useful, so I've bumped this from 2 to 100. You're also bumped from new user to regular; [in theory](https://blog.discourse.org/2018/06/understanding-discourse-trust-levels/) discourse automatically adjusts trust levels as you read/post/comment/etc.
